As you read more into the pages about Plasticity Dr. Phallic made this over reading the Fantastic 4 comics and betting himself that he can create Mr. Fantastic power and improve upon it. Unfortunately, he overestimated his abilities, and while miles ahead of what any here or at your homeworld can do it feel short in his goal to improve upon what Mr. Fantastic has.

Skimming through the sci-fic jargon. The limit you can reshape, resize, and stretch yourself is 5x a day. The body simply can't handle anymore structural recombination before turning back into your original shape to conserve energy. Any more and you'll end up as a puddle on the ground taking 3 days to build back energy to return you to your original shape.

Also for 6 hours, you'll smell like caramel candy. The sweat you build from exercising will taste like caramel too. Even with more experiments done on himself to find the source of this side effect nothing came up. Frankly, with how much worse this could have been smelling and tasting like your favorite sweets are of no consequence.

Luckily the effects wear out after 14 days with no deformation to the body after long periods without using it. You breathed a sigh of relief. Of course, you wouldn't use this but knowing this isn't a permanent thing shows this world still has restrictions to its madness. Very loose terms with sexual tension and balls to the wall limits but limits you can deal with.

You were about to put the book down when you notice at the bottom of page 104 was a highlighted reminder to open the draw and play the recordings of his transformations and see any noticeable benefits or differences from his experiments.

You looked into the door but realized there was no recording device, just a unsharpened pencil. Maybe Phallic picked up the recorder before he left. You decided to check under the desk if he made a hidden compartment for the device. Dr. Phallic being the Mad Professor he is probably would be paranoid to do that.

You drop down and crawled under the desk looking for a switch, button, or high tech eye scanner before looking at a small hole under the draw. You knocked on it and heard nothing but the sound was different signifying it was hollow.

'But why would he drill a small hole into it.' You thought in confusion, scrunching your face in concentration before realizing the purpose of this.

'You got to be kidding me.' You think in disbelief as you crawled out of from under the desk and reach into the draw pulling out the pencil and sliding it into the hole underneath it.

Immediately the bottom lifted up revealing space in between where tapped under it was an android touchscreen cellphone.

'This is straight out of Death Note!' You thought to that scene were Light hid his death note from unwanted visitors.

'Even down to the makeshift fire system?!' You look in and found the same contraction Light used to burn the Notebook if someone forced their way into it.

Mad Professor is right. You couldn't think what great paranoia would cause a man to go to such great lengths to do this.

Taking up and peeling the tape off the phone you realize it was blackberry phone that-

While busy rotating the phone you thumbed the side sliding the touch screen to reveal a keyboard underneath it.

"Oh shit!" You said as you look at it fully now amazed that phone. It was a blackberry phone! You thought they were bought out or discontinued like the Nokia but apparently, companies still produce this make in this day and age. Though seeing how the Professor operates this would fit his M.O. If the screen gets busted or the touchscreen isn't responding good old fashion keyboard to the rescue!

Tapping the lock screen you are greeted to the Professor walking away from an explosion in the background at night. A cocky smirk on his face with his lab coat blowing in the wind. The picture invoking the cool guys don't look at explosions vibe. Noticing no type of password lock you opened it and was greeted to the home screen picture of him smiling but his face was scrunched up in a look of annoyance at somebody with white liquid dripping down his face.

You hope it wasn't cum.

Ignoring that you went straight to videos and scrolled for a folder labeled Plasticity walked out of the lab to the kitchen grabbing another can of Coca Cola, and a bowl of chicken soup to put in the microwave. You are hungry! After it finished heating you find a table to sit at, rest the phone on a phallic-looking glass with flowers poking were the cockhead should be press play, and ate watching the experiments.

After 20 minutes of watching the video, it comes to an end and by the end of it, you left mouth agape staring awestruck at the information it provided you.

Recapping what was written down in the notebook with enough training the jello can give you limited shapeshifting powers to turn into other people and also into animals. So far with constant use in 5 months, you can shapeshift into a snake, eel, octopus, and dog. Though you would need to revert to a liquid-like state before turning into these things as it makes it easier on your body. Becoming more accustomed to this world fixation on all this sexual the first three weren't surprising. Japanese people have a fixation on Octopuses and femboys this world would be their paradise!

The dog was a little out there seeing how the first three was long and cylindrical-like but that's par for course in this world.

Another trick is using your liquid-like state in times of crisis you can use it to catch objects in your body, slow down the impact or send the back.

'The Professor sure doesn't spare expense.' You thought while drinking down the last of the soup with a look of distraught on your face.

Seeing a man angle a shotgun to his body, willing to potentially kill himself to verify his experiment was always something interesting to see. So it came as no surprise that his left arm catches all the bullets in his hand, it stretching in all directing as the bullets try hard to escape the slimy hand cage before stopping and falling through his hands. He was panicking with sweat falling down his face, and having no desire to do that again threw away the gun, luckily without setting it off but his cheers of Eureka and Success overrode his fear. The test was a success and that's all that mattered to him.

Honestly, that made it harder for you to swallow your food but you pushed on. Oddly this inspired you to watch some gun firing videos.

Now besides this dangerous but wonderful product of science something about this world had you scratching your head and nervously rubbing your hands. You don't know what but it sets you off. You found a lot of information at the Library but it just wasn't enough and besides trying to grasp the logic of reproduction the human race on this world has is lost you another prominent problem is how severe is the sexual tension is in this world? Surely there's a cap to how much lust one can give and receive and even in another universe filled with just men it can be that bad?

Well, now you have a device that isn't tied to time out window user features, with a full battery, full bars, and 10 different browsers. 'Phallic sure is meticulous when it comes to research', you pondered at his use of so many browsers but it helps you as you can compare news articles and now is the perfect time to find out.

You finished your search in the next two hours.

"Unbelievable." You whispered to yourself, head down in your hands thinking about all the information you digested.

Sex was rampant in this world! It's all these people think about! The symbolism is everywhere from ice cream shaped dicks and ball sacks, art museums, glory hole restrooms, and the tight clothes that show of people's bulge and body skin.

Never thought you see the day Pornhub was unanimously rejoiced by the world without scathing remarks and flustered embarrassment.

Mostly here in Wood Valley is sex movies. You shake your head at the absurdity of the names they made. Cocks Of Mass Destruction 3! Some guy named Lex, a high schooler build up a reputation of fucking guys with a meat load made to spitroast horses with room to spare! How he's able to walk around the town with such a python you don't know.

What even more balking was the younger older relationships. Kids at 10 were dating men 3x there age. At this point you expect some sissy boy being trained to suck his cock to get extra credit from a teacher! You gnashed your teeth in frustration over this nightmare of the world. The most infuriating thing wasn't this fuck attitude towards fucking. Well, not just that. A whole world of only men! Sure, it only logical the testosterone and sex appeal would skyrocket like a whore being pass around by sugar daddies. No, what made it worse was that YOU are weak as fuck in this world! Lex holding the Leviathan cock along with Phallic's gun video got you to look up the physical nature of this world. Kids here can probably smack you around as Hulk did to Loki!


It won't matter how well you'll deny people here. If it came to a fight your best punch equals a heavily sick man's jab in this world.
154.title: Plasticity and a Wake Up Call

info.brief_description: The story of the only straight person in the Ultimate Gay World!
info.description:
Johnny Dixon is your typical white straight male in his twenties. He wakes up in the morning, has breakfast, goes to work, and comes back home to see his girlfriend Sally on a typical day. All of that changed when he was yanked out of his universe by a mad scientist named Professor Phallic. Now Johnny finds himself in a strange but familiar universe that is similar to our own humorously known as Gay World.

Gay World is a universe just like ours except there are no women. The history and entertainment is very close to ours but there are no females. They either don't exist or are replaced with male versions of themselves. Now due to there only being one sex it means that everyone is gay and that sexual things aren't considered as taboo as they are here. The style of clothes for the most part reveal more skin and are generally skin tight to show off people's physique. Public nudity and sex aren't allowed but you will still see a lot of sexually focused media and a large focus on what people are packing. Speaking of that, this world has a lot more testosterone going around meaning that the average penis size is larger than ours and people start getting very noticeable growth spurts when hitting puberty, and we are not talking about height. This would be a great place to live if you are gay or bi, but sadly Johnny is straight, so this heaven might be more like hell if he doesn't get into the spirit.

Welcome to the Ultimate Gay story here, we hope you enjoy it!

Rules for this story:
Johnny is straight, so any sexual interaction he encounters with a male is not one he enjoys. He cannot be magically turned gay or hypnotized into being gay. If you want to turn Johnny gay then it has to take time and be believable for him to change.
No magic or anything supernatural, super science stuff is acceptable but only in the fifth option. All size changing, transformation type of fetishes are reserved for the fifth story please.
No gore, death, hard murder, or hard gore please.
Your imagination can run wild here, just make sure your chapter makes sense, is coherent, and is at least 1000 characters long. More description is better for everyone!

Characters:
Johnny Dixon(25)Johnny is the protagonist of this story. He has short blond hair, a fit average build and is straight. Sadly in this new world he finds himself in people don't understand the concept of being "straight" and confuse him as just being really good at playing hard to get.
-The Hardcastles
Peter(39) Has short brown hair, glasses and a short brown beard. He is the homemaker of the family, having a meek physic keeping the house cleaned, making dinner and watching after the boys most of the time. Peter is a very kind and gentle soul who wouldn't hurt a fly. He is the stereotypical dainty flower, talking with a lisp and being a limp wrist but in the bedroom behind closed doors he can surprise you.
Dick(42) Has black well kept hair, is tall and has a bulky build like a linebacker. Dick is the bread winner in the family, off to work and bringing home the bacon. He has a deep voice and is positively manly. He works in a office in sales, usually coming back home with a hunger for food and a hunger for his husband. He is a fun guy to be around, very supportive and can be a bit too boastful.
Hank(17) Has straight jet black hair combed forward to cover his face in an emo cut. Hank is your average angsty teenager who dresses up in gothic clothing and just wants to be left alone. Often times he seems disinterested and just stays glued to his phone, texting his boyfriend. He doesn't like doing family activities but he does find Johnny to be a cutie and might be more willing to do stuff with him.
Rusty(12) Has a bowl cut red straight hair. He is the baby of the family and often uses that to excuse most of his actions either playing ignorance or immaturity. Rusty is a bit of a sissy but that just makes him seem more adorable to everyone except his older brother who finds him to be a pest. His favorite color is pink and he is excited that he is reaching puberty earlier than most kids in his class.

Thanks to user Mr. Z for coming up with the idea for this one.
